oracle.describing: real data distribution G oracle ( x t |x 1 , . . . , x t?1 )

first initialize.from sentence: To setup the synthetic data experiments , we first initialize the parameters of an LSTM network following the normal distribution N ( 0 , 1 ) as the oracle describing the real data distribution G oracle ( x t |x 1 , . . . , x t?1 ) .

training set.from sentence: In SeqGAN algorithm , the training set for the discriminator is comprised by the generated examples with the label 0 and the instances from S with the label

training process.from sentence: In the scheduled sampling , the training process gradually changes from a fully guided scheme feeding the true previous tokens into LSTM , towards a less guided scheme which mostly feeds the LSTM with its generated tokens .

in.from sentence: For different tasks , one should design specific structure for the convolutional layer and in our synthetic data experiments , the kernel size is from 1 to T and the number of each kernel size is between 100 to 200 3 .

Dropout ) and L2 regularization.from sentence: Dropout ) and L2 regularization are used to avoid over-fitting .

has.from sentence: A curriculum rate ? is used to control the probability of replacing the true tokens with the generated ones .
